function.name: virDomainLxcOpenNamespace
function.info:
This API is LXC specific, so it will only work with hypervisor connections to the LXC driver.
Open the namespaces associated with the container @domain and return a list of file descriptors associated with the container.
The returned file descriptors are intended to be used with the setns() system call.

return.info: the list of open file descriptors, or -1 on error
